email_chain.subject: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, I hope this email finds you well. I’m reaching out regarding your inquiry for a crude oil shipment from Houston to Rotterdam. We have a suitable vessel, the MV Ocean Star, with a DWT of 150,000 and LOA of 280m. The laycan is 15-20 October. I can offer a starting freight rate of $52.50 per metric ton. Let me know your thoughts. Best, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, thanks for the quick response. The vessel details look good, but the freight rate is a bit higher than expected. Would you consider $50.75 per metric ton? Also, can you confirm the demurrage rate? Looking forward to your reply. Cheers, John

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, thanks for your feedback. I can adjust the freight rate to $51.25 per metric ton, which I believe is fair given the current market. The demurrage rate is $20,000 per day, pro rata. Let me know if this works for you. Best, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, thanks for the revised rate. I can agree to $51.25 per metric ton. Please confirm the laycan remains 15-20 October and that the vessel will be ready for loading on time. Also, can we cap the demurrage at $20,000 per day? Regards, John

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, confirmed—the laycan is 15-20 October, and the MV Ocean Star will be ready for loading as agreed. The demurrage rate is capped at $20,000 per day. I’ll send over the charter party agreement shortly. Thanks for your cooperation. Best, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, sounds good. Please proceed with the charter party agreement. Looking forward to finalizing this shipment. Cheers, John
